# <a name="delete-a-contact-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="42925-102">在 Outlook.com 中刪除連絡人</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="42925-102">Delete a contact in Outlook.com</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="42925-103">在頁面左下角，選取 [ **人員** ] 圖示</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="42925-103">At the bottom left corner of the page, select the **People** icon</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
<span data-ttu-id="42925-104">.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="42925-104">.</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="42925-105">選取您要刪除的連絡人，然後選取 [ **刪除**]。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="42925-105">Select the contact you want to delete and select **Delete**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="42925-106">如果您無法選取 [ **刪除**]，則連絡人可能來自 Skype 或連線的社交網路帳戶。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="42925-106">If you can't select **Delete**, the contact might be from Skype or a connected social network account.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="42925-107">若要刪除連絡人，請移至 [Skype] 或連絡人所在的帳戶。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="42925-107">To delete the contact, go to Skype or the account where the contact is located.</span></span>
